Summary: orange ball light 2000ft 200-300 miles per hour no noise at all
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were taking our to dogs out for a walk when we both looked into the sky and we saw an orange light we watched it for about 7 minutes coming staright at us and over us it looked so odd there were no starboard or port lights it flew over us at about 2000 ft from east to west heading toward teeside once over us there was no noise at all i took a photo and when i have blown it up it looks like a big firey worm bending and twisting i have reported this to the local police ...what else do u do...both me and my wife were nervous through out and now we feel sick and very anxious i have the photo on my sony ericcson phone the quality of the pic is alot better have you seen anything like this before
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There were no other sightings in Durham on or around August 8th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
